alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 8:10AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG... Patchy dense fog with areas of freezing fog is being observed from Winslow to Holbrook along Interstate 40 and southward toward Heber along State Route 377. The freezing fog may cause slick roads. If driving, use caution and slow down. The fog is expected to last through 10 AM MST. Locations impacted include... Show Low, Winslow, Holbrook, Taylor, Clay Springs, Joseph City, Shumway, Woodruff, Aripine, Linden, Pinedale, Sun Valley, Snowflake, Chevelon Canyon Dam, Heber-overgaard, Chevelon Butte, Chevelon Canyon Lake Campground, Homolovi State Park Campground, Dry Lake and Chevelon Crossing Campground. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 252 and 289. Interstate 40 between mile markers 246 and 301. State Route 377 between mile markers 0 and 33. Visibilities are below one quarter of a mile in the fog. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains
